Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,'' Larry Page said. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.
